title: Roasted eggplants
intro: The easiest (but still delicious) way to cook eggplants.

insSteps: Cut each eggplant in half lengthwise (do not peel). Score the flesh with a knife in a criss-crossing pattern.
Drizzle a bit of olive oil on each eggplant.
Add salt, and any herbs or spice of your choice.
Roast in the oven at 200 °C until soft (about 35 minutes).
